summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to gambling; defining offenses and prescribing penalties therefor, and amending the Seattle Criminal Code (Ordinance 102843) by adding new Sections 12A.36.050 through 12A.36.070 thereto and repealing Sections 12A.36.080, 12A.36.100, 12A.36.120, 12A.36.140, 12A.36.160 and 12A.36.180 thereof.
